EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PUBLIC SERVICE REARRANGEMENT AND TRANSFER OF DUTIES ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Order Transferring Certain Portions of the Department of Human Resources Development to the Department of Human Resources and Skills Development

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to paragraph 2(a) of the Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act, hereby transfers

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: from the Department of Human Resources Development to the Department of Human Resources and Skills Development the control and supervision of the following portions of the Department of Human Resources Development:

Provision.Label: (i)
Provision.Text: the Human Investment Programs Branch, except

Provision.Label: (A)
Provision.Text: those portions associated with the Social Development Partnership Program,

Provision.Label: (B)
Provision.Text: the Office for Disability Issues, and

Provision.Label: (C)
Provision.Text: those portions involving the Canada Student Loans Program call centres and web-services,

Provision.Label: (ii)
Provision.Text: the Employment Programs Branch, except those portions that administer employment programs for persons with disabilities,

Provision.Label: (iii)
Provision.Text: the Insurance Programs Branch, except those portions related to

Provision.Label: (A)
Provision.Text: activities related to the streamlining and automation of services and benefits processing, including Modernizing Services for Canadians and Government on Line,

Provision.Label: (B)
Provision.Text: the Social Insurance Number and Social Insurance Register operations, and

Provision.Label: (C)
Provision.Text: channel management activities related to call centres and web-services,

Provision.Label: (iv)
Provision.Text: those portions of the Strategic Policy Branch related to labour market policy and learning policy,

Provision.Label: (v)
Provision.Text: the National Secretariat for Homelessness, and

Provision.Label: (vi)
Provision.Text: all in-person services functions related to the programs and services of the Department of Human Resources Development, and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: from the Minister of Human Resources Development to be styled Minister of Social Development to the Minister of State to be styled Minister of Human Resources and Skills Development the powers, duties and functions relating to

Provision.Label: (i)
Provision.Text: the employment insurance boards of referees established under Part VI of the Employment Insurance Acta, conferred upon the Minister of Human Resources under that Act, and

Provision.Label: (ii)
Provision.Text: the Canada Employment Insurance Commission conferred upon the Minister of Human Resources Development under the Employment Insurance Acta and the Department of Human Resources Development Actb,
